name: Hungry Knight GameBoy
description:
An Unofficial free fan demake of Team Cherry's Ludum Dare 27 entry, Hungry Knight. Unofficially remade for the GameBoy Color.

Disclaimer:

I am in no way associated with Team Cherry, I am just a fan and an indie GB Studio Developer.

Hungry Knight is a property by Team Cherry. The original game can be found on https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/643636.

Team Cherry's entry for the Ludum Dare Game Jam 27! Team Cherry: Rohan Fraser Ari Gibson William Pellen The theme of this jam was 10 Seconds. So we present to you Hungry Knight, a determined little adventurer with a big appetite. Fight your way through a strange wasteland, keep yourself fed every ten seconds, and accomplish a miracle. Others may perish at your hand, but such is the remorselessness of this world. A challenging action game. It's hard, but you can do it! Be brave.

This is a free unofficial fan project and a love letter to the "First born child". Please support Team Cherry and their official titles.

This Fan Game is free to play, but if you want, please consider supporting me and my future projects by contributing to my other projects or by following me on itch or twitter https://twitter.com/ELVIEStm.

Controls: FUNCTIONKEYBOARDCONSOLEMovementWASD or Arrow KeysDirectional ButtonsAttackX or KB ButtonDashZ or JA Button Note:

This is only the first build, as such there may be bugs in game [hehe]. Please report bugs here. I plan to add a Zote Mode, Myla Mode, and Hornet Mode soon.

This Fan Game is free to play, but if you want, please consider supporting me and my future projects by contributing to my other projects or by following me on itch or twitter.
